articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Presidents of Cuba and Viet Nam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Presidents of Cuba and Viet Nam
Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is attending the 15th NAM summit, Tuesday separately met and had talks with Raul Castro Ruz, President of the Council of State of Cuba, and Nguyen Minh Triet, President of Viet Nam.
					 The talks were held in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Chairman of WFDY Arrives
articles.content:
Chairman of WFDY Arrives
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira, chairman of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, arrived here today.

articles.title: Symposium on Feature Film Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Feature Film Held 
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- A symposium of the Juche-oriented idea of literature and arts on Korean feature film "White Birch of Mt. Paektu" was held on July 15.
					 The speakers said that the film is evoking lively response from among servicepersons and people and youngsters, in particular.
					
					 The production of the film greatly helpful to firmly arming the servicepersons, working people and school youth and children with the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu is a success as it glorifies the new hey day in developing the Juche-oriented cinematic art, they said, and continued:
					
					 The film impressively tells truth that eternal happiness and rosy future are in store for the Korean nation only when the traditions of Mt. Paektu are carried forward with intense loyalty, thus making a successful ideological and artistic clarification of the issue raised by the times.
					
					 The film emphasizes that the youth in our times should take the lead in devotedly safeguarding the leader and that the mission of the youth in the Songun era is to become vanguard fighters upholding and preserving the revolutionary traditions, they added.
					
					 They called on all the creators and artistes to thoroughly arm themselves with the WPK's idea and theory of literature and arts and produce more masterpieces in the Songun era by drawing on the successes and experience gained through the creation of the film.

articles.title: Noodle Mixed with Wormwood
articles.content:
Noodle Mixed with Wormwood
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce of the DPRK has made a new noodle mixed with wormwood.
					 The Korean people have widely used wormwood as Koryo medicinal materials from long ago. It rich in elements good for health strengthens stomach, depresses and sterilizes germs, lowers blood pressure and blood sugar and helps sedation and diuresis.
					
					 Researchers of the university overcame the seasonal limitations in making the noodle and raised the quality of the products by treating wormwood with heat in a simple way. The wormwood grows in all parts of the country.
					
					 Through repeated experiments and analyses, they came to a conclusion that wormwood gives the good color to noodle and has no influence on toughness of the noodle. At last, they succeeded in making the specific wormwood noodle and put the cooking method on a scientific basis and standardization.
					
					 The fragrant wormwood noodle has a special taste and is tough.
					
					 It, which gives a new function to the noodle, the favorite traditional dish of the Korean people, stimulates the appetite of the people. It is also good for the people with diseases in the digestive system.

articles.title: Pearly Luster Paint Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Pearly Luster Paint Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Building Materials Research Center under the Paektusan Architectural Institute of the DPRK has newly developed pearly luster paint, a final coating material of buildings.
					The serviceable life of the paint with beautiful colors and mysterious luster is more than three times that of the metallic luster paint and its production cost is low because it does not use the expensive metal dust.
					
					 Its adhesive intensity is high and it is not washed easily. It has golden, red, copper, light blue and other colors.
					
					 The paint is applicable to concrete, granite and wood.
					
					 It has been applied to plaque and ornamental design of buildings, plaster goods and others in various units to enjoy high appreciation.

articles.title: Devoted Services Rendered to National Reunification
articles.content:
Devoted Services Rendered to National Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are yearning for President Kim Il Sung in July, recollecting in humble reverence the immortal feats performed by him who devoted his whole life to national reunification with warm love for the country and the nation.
					 The President put his heart and soul into the reunification of the country, apprehending more than anybody else the misfortunes and sufferings imposed upon the fellow-countrymen by the division of the country.
					
					 He convened the historic April Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea after the liberation of the country to resolutely smash the scheme of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for "separate election and separate government". After then, he had put forward reasonable proposals to make peaceful environment for the great unity of the nation and the reunification of the country and taken many steps for the purpose in every period and stage of the developing reunification movement.
					
					 In the 1970s, he made a breakthrough into the deadlocked north-south dialogue and negotiation and saw to it that the July 4 north-south joint statement with the three principles of national reunification as the main content was published, thus opening up a turning phase for reunification.
					
					 In the 1980s he, who had set it forth as the supreme task of the nation to achieve national reunification, laid down the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo to be adhered to consistently by the entire Korean nation.
					
					 In the early 1990s when the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean bellicose forces staged the "team spirit" joint military exercises and prattled about the "collective sanctions" against the DPRK, he published the famous work "The 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" so that the whole nation could defend peace of the country and turn out as one in the efforts for achieving its long-cherished desire.
					
					 He, with warm compatriotism and boundless magnanimity, led the people of all strata to the sacred cause of national reunification. Saying the greatest gift that he would give to the nation was the reunification of the country, he approved a document on reunification issue and left his autograph in it in the last moments of his great life.
					
					 The immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification will shine long century after century.

articles.title: Japan's Increased Military Pressure and Frantic Sanctions against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Increased Military Pressure and Frantic Sanctions against DPRK under Fire 
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are busy these days increasing military pressure and tightening sanctions against the DPRK. These moves cannot be construed otherwise than very ill-boding developments when their frantic moves to turn Japan into a military giant and launch reinvasion are taken into consideration. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 The article of the Constitution of Japan banning its participation in a war has become defunct, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Since the demise of the Cold War, the Japanese reactionaries have zealously pushed forward their moves to have in place offensive armed forces for reinvasion while openly disclosing their true militarist colors.
					
					 Since the outset of the new century, in particular, Japan has frantically stepped up its moves for militarization under the strong backing and patronage of its U.S. master and escalated the overseas advance of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" and military operations in combat areas. 
					
					 Moreover, Japan has entered the stage of realizing space militarization, arousing great caution and concern of the world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have paved a wide avenue for the "SDF's" overseas military operations by adopting a variety of war legislations under the spurious signboard of "contribution to peace". 
					
					 Japan has designated overseas military operations as its state policy and, on this basis, busied itself infusing the militarist idea into the minds of the rising generation in a bid to hurl them into the actions to realize the wild ambition of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" which the Japanese imperialists failed to do in the past. 
					
					 What merits particular attention in the above-said moves is that Japanese reactionaries are openly advocating the theory of "preemptive attack" and that of "acquiring capability to attack enemy bases". 
					
					 What is ridiculous is the fact that the Japanese militarists are now raising a hue and cry over someone's "military threat" and making much ado about the "threat to the security" of Japan. All this is, however, nothing but rhetoric intended to cover up the aggressive nature and danger of its moves to turn itself into a military giant and those for overseas expansion. 
					
					 History goes to prove that Japan likes to launch a preemptive attack. 
					
					 But, the preemptive strike touted by Japan at present is bound to lead to self-destruction, warns the article.

articles.title: More Dynamic Movement for National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
More Dynamic Movement for National Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are getting evermore undisguised in their repressive offensive to crack down upon and stamp out the pro-reunification democratic forces. This reality urgently requires the pro-reunification democratic forces to firmly unite under the banner of the north-south joint declaration in order to resolutely frustrate the anti-reunification repressive offensive of the group of traitors and to reenergize the movement for national reunification. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Tremendous is the strength of the popular masses united close as one with the will for reunification and patriotism. Only when they rely on their strength is it possible to frustrate any frantic fascist repressive offensive of the anti-reunification forces and bring about a surge in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a great programme for the country's reunification common to the nation and a banner of national unity.
					
					 Whoever stands for the country's reunification should resolutely defend and support the said declarations and increase solidarity and alliance in the struggle to implement them. This represents the unity of the pro-reunification democratic forces.
					
					 The brutal suppression of the progressive organizations in south Korea is little short of an unpardonable anti-reunification fascist offensive as it is aimed at branding all activities to achieve the concord of the nation and the country's reunification and co-prosperity by implementing the said declarations as "illegal" and "enemy-benefiting" ones and indiscriminately suppressing them and stamping out the movement for the country's reunification.
					
					 If these repressive actions are allowed to go on, not only the above-said organizations but all the progressive organizations of the reunification movement in south Korea will fall victim to the fascist crackdown at the point of bayonet and this will entail irrevocable grave consequences. 
					
					 The only way out is for the pro-reunification democratic forces of various circles to decisively frustrate the fascist repressive offensive of the group of traitors going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Retraction of Disciplinary Measures against Members of Jongyojo Demanded
articles.content:
Retraction of Disciplinary Measures against Members of Jongyojo Demanded
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Assemblymen from the Democratic Party of south Korea on July 13 urged the puppet minister of Education, Science and Technology and other to retract the disciplinary measures taken against teachers under the "National Teachers Union" (Jongyojo).
					 They went to the minister and the superintendent of Education in Seoul that day. Noting that the disciplinary measures taken by them against teachers of Jongyojo and indictment made against them for the mere reason that they participated in the actions issuing a declaration on the situation obviously amount to double punishment, they urged the educational authorities to stop the politically-motivated suppression of them.
					
					 In another development, the chairman of Jongyojo launched indefinite sit-in hunger-strike in Seoul on July 13 in protest against the suppression by the Lee Myung Bak fascist dictatorial regime.
					
					 He denounced the Lee group for having taken the disciplinary measures against the teachers after branding them as "criminals" for having waged the movement for issuing the declarations on the situation demanding the Lee group stop its misrule.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Political parties, ministry and organizations of different countries and international and regional bodies sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in the relevant countries from June 30 to July 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					They included the National Political Bureau of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar, the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar, the Yangon City Development Committee, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), the All-India Forward Bloc, the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, the University of Delhi, the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry of Guinea, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia, the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of political parties and organizations, book exhibition and film show were held in Nepal and remembrance meetings in Russia and Belarus on July 7 and 8 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Il Sung is the benevolent liberator of the Korean nation as he saved the Korean people from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and the great leader who was acclaimed for the first time in the Korean history of 5,000 years. He is also an elder statesman in the 20th century who led the anti-imperialist and anti-feudal democratic revolution and the socialist revolution to victory despite manifold trials and hardships and challenges, the speaker added.
					
					 The secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest person whom no leader of the world can match in ideology, exploits and traits.
					
					 Yuri Vanin, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, highly lauded Kim Il Sung as the great revolutionary who devoted all his life to the country and the revolution, the father of the people possessed of genuine popular traits, the prominent leader with incomparably great ideas and theories and ample knowledge and an experienced statesman who built socialism in Korea in reliance on its own efforts.
					
					 Vladimir Veredin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Soviet Union, stressed that Kim Il Sung is the greatest man among the revolutionaries in the 20th century as he turned the DPRK into an impregnable bulwark for socialism and peace, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 L. Shukolinikov, coordinating secretary of the National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus, said: Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and a prominent activist of the international labor movement, is always alive in our hearts. 
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the remembrance meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Raul Castro Ruz y Nguyen Minh Triet
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Raul Castro Ruz y Nguyen Minh Triet
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien asiste a la 15o Cumbre de los Paises no Alineados, departio el dia 14 en un ambiente amistoso con Raul Castro Ruz, presidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, y Nguyen Minh Triet, presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, respectivamente.

articles.title: Tiene lugar simposio sobre pelicula "Abedul del Paektu"
articles.content:
Tiene lugar simposio sobre pelicula "Abedul del Paektu"
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 el simposio sobre la idea literaria y artistica del Juche con respecto a la pelicula de ficcion "Abedul del Paektu".
					En la ocasion los oradores senalaron que ese filme tiene gran repercusion entre el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, en particular, los jovenes de nueva generacion.
					
					Anadieron que la creacion de esa pelicula, que contribuira mucho a armar firmemente a los militares del Ejercito Popular, los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares con las tradiciones revolucionarias del monte Paektu, constituye un notable exito para glorificar la nueva era dorada del desarrollo del arte cinematografico jucheano.
					
					Argumentaron que esa pelicula dio una dilucidacion magnifica en lo ideo-artistico al problema de la epoca al corroborar de modo impresionante el principio filosofico de que continuar puramente el linaje del Paektu es la garantia de felicidad eterna y futuro de la nacion coreana.
					
					Afirmaron que ella hace enfasis en que los jovenes de la epoca del Songun deben situarse en la primera linea de la defensa a ultranza al Lider y cumplir la mision de vanguardia en defender y mantener las tradiciones revolucionarias.
					
					Por ultimo, los seminaristas exhortaron a todos los creadores y artistas a armarse firmemente con la idea y teoria del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la literatura y el arte y producir mucho mas obras maestras de la era del Songun basandose en los exitos y experiencias adquiridos con la pelicula "Abedul del Paektu".

articles.title: Cestos de flores a representaciones coreanas en varios paises
articles.content:
Cestos de flores a representaciones coreanas en varios paises
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente   Kim Il Sung, llegaron del 30 de junio al 8 de julio los cestos de flores a las representaciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditadas en varios paises.
					Entre los remitentes figuran el Buro Politico Nacional del Partido por el Progreso y la Unidad de Guinea, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Bangladesh, el CC del Partido Comunista de Bangladesh (Marxista-Leninista), el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Myanmar, la Asociacion de Union, Solidaridad y Desarrollo de Myanmar, el Comite de Desarrollo de la ciudad de Yangon, la Asociacion de Amistad Vietnam-Corea, el CC del Partido Comunista de la India (Marxista), el Frente Progresista de Toda la India, la Asociacion de Amistad India-Corea de Toda la India, la Sociedad de Estudio de la Idea Juche en Delhi, el Grupo de Estudio de la Politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) de la India, el Comite Indio de Estudio de la Filosofia Juche, la Universidad de Delhi, la Asociacion de Amistad Guinea-Corea, el Comite Nacional Guineo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche en Conakry, el Comite Nacional Nigeriano de Estudio de la Idea Juche, l
					
					 a Compania M.K.P. de Malasia, el Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche y el Instituto Regional Asiatico de la Idea Juche.

articles.title: Fideo de artemisa
articles.content:
Fideo de artemisa
  Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- La Universidad de Comercio Jang Chol Gu de Pyongyang preparo el nuevo kuksu (fideo) con la artemisa.
					  Desde la antiguedad el pueblo coreano ha venido utilizando mucho esta planta medicinal de Coryo.
					
					  La artemisa tiene muchos elementos favorables a la salud del hombre, y desempena en el cuerpo fisico varios papeles: el fortalecimiento del estomago, la detencion y la esterilizacion de las bacterias, la baja de la presion arterial y la glucosa en sangre, la serenidad y la diuresis.
					
					  Los investigadores de ese plantel docente, al aplicar simple tratamiento termico a la artemisa que crece en todos los lugares, superaron su caracter estacional y elevaron la calidad del articulo.
					
					  A traves de varias pruebas y analisis comprobaron que esa planta mejora el color del kuksu y no da influencia al caracter elastico de este alimento y, por fin, produjeron el especifico kuksu de artemisa. Y realizaron la cientifizacion y la estandarizacion del metodo de su elaboracion. 
					
					  El fragante kuksu de artemisa tiene el sabor particular y da el sentimiento elastico y flexible al masticarlo.
					
					  Este plato abre el apetito y da influencia buena a la salud de las personas con enfermedades del sistema digestivo.
